title: Oru Paadhi Kadhavu Lyrics Thaandavam Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Song : Oru paadhi kadhavu neeyadi
Singer: Haricharan & Vandhana
Movie: Thaandavam
Music : GV Prakash Kumar
Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
Nee enbadhey naan thaanadi
nan enbadhey naam thaandai..

Oru paadhi kadhavu neeyadi
maru paadhi kadhavu naanadi
paarthukonde pirindhirundhom
serthu vaika kathirundhom

Oru paadhi kadhavu neeyada
maru paadhi kadhvu naanada
thaazh thirandhe kaathirundhom
kaatru veesa paarthirundhom

Nee enbadhey naan thaanadi
nan enbadhey naam thaandai..

Oru paadhi kadhavu neeyadi
maru paadhi kadhavu naanadi

Iruvu varum thiruttu bayam
kadhavugalai serthuvidum
Oh kadhavugali thirudi vidum
adhisayathai kaadhil seiyum

Irandum kaikorthu serndhadhu
idayil poi pootu ponadhu
Vaasal thallaadudhe
thindaadudhe kondaadudhe

Oru paadhi kadhavu neeyadi
maru paadhi kadhavu naanadi

Idi idithum mazhai adithum
asayamal nindrirundhom
Indreno nam moochin
men kaatril ninaidhuvittom

Idhayam onraagi ponadhe
kadhave illaamal aanadhe
Inimel nam veetrile
poongaatru thaan dhinam veesume

Oru paadhi kadhavu neeyadi
maru paadhi kadhavu naanadi
paarthukonde pirindhirundhom
serthu vaika kathirunthom

Oru paadhi kadhavu neeyadi
maru paadhi kadhavu naanadi
paarthukonde pirindhirundhom
serthu vaika kathirundhom

Oru paadhi kadhavu neeyada
maru paadhi kadhvu naanada
thaazh thirandhe kaathirundhom
kaatru veesa paarthirundhom

Nee enbadhey naan thaanadi
nan enbadhey naam thaandai..

 English Translation
I tried my best :)
“you” means “me”
“me” means “we both”

half of the door is you
other half is me
seeing  eye to eye, we stood alone
we waited to get close

half of the door is you
other half is me
We waited keeping the door opened
We were seeing for air

“you” means “me”
“me” means “we both”

half of the door is you
other half is me

Fear that comes at night
Will make the door closed.
It will steal the doors but
Will give boon to us

These two joined by holding hands
Distance between them was gone
Its not steady
Its not proper but its happy

half of the door is you
other half is me

even after thunder and rain
we stood without moving,
but what is it today, we got wet
in our breathing air

two hearts joined together
no doors now
from now on, new breeze will
come in our home

half of the door is you
other half is me
even  seeing  eye to eye, we stood alone
we waited to get close

half of the door is you
other half is me
seeing  eye to eye, we stood alone
we waited to get close

half of the door is you
other half is me
We waited keeping the door opened
We were seeing for air

“you” means “me”
“me” means “we both”
